title: NEW: The Snow – Memory Loss
body:
**The** **Snow** is a collaborative effort between **Wild** **Nothing’s** Jack Tatum, **Beach Fossils’** Dustin Payseur and **Holograms’** Andreas Lagerström.

The track is moulded in a typically **Captured Tracks** fashion; it’s all jangly guitars, Morrissey-esque vocals and blurry production. A strong first release from a collective of great musicians.

_Memory Loss_ available on Record Store Day (19/4) on 7 inch via Captured Tracks.
